Just Cause 2. Basically GTA4 with more destruction physics and a grappling hook. Also a superman that farts parachutes on demand.

Some people are making Multiplayer for it. That includes someone named Ydrool. Kinda similar to your name huh?

EDIT: It\'s also very optimized. Very nice.
Double post, but beta test in 10 minutes. Just saying for those with JC2.
